duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to expand O Boticario's presence in the US market.
Build and maintain relationships with current clients and prospect new clients to grow the customer base.
Support and guide customers through the purchasing process, ensuring sufficient inventory and assortment to meet local demand.
Establish constructive relationships with clients to ensure sustainable growth of the value chain.
Prospect, visit, and convert new clients, supporting them in their initial steps within the official O Boticario US reseller program.
Achieve sales targets and KPIs, participating in meetings and training events.
Report field feedback and provide qualitative insights to management.
Utilize vehicle for travel between cities, with reimbursement for mileage, fuel, and occasional travel expenses.

education_certification.credential: Fluency in Portuguese, US Work Permit (required), Bachelor's degree in Sales, Marketing, or Business (Master's preferred)
